channel.title: Error
channel.description:
just got this error while going to moparisthebest.com/smf
[code]Warning: require_once(/home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/Sources/Subs.php) [function.require-once]: failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php on line 58
Fatal error: require_once() [function.require]: Failed opening required '/home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/Sources/Subs.php' (include_path='.:/usr/share/php:/usr/share/pear') in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php on line 58[/code] Had to refresh a couple of times to get it away, did anyone else get this or was it just me?
EDIT: argh! again, this time while going into a topic [code]Warning: require_once(/home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/Sources/Subs.php) [function.require-once]: failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php on line 58
Fatal error: require_once() [function.require]: Failed opening required '/home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/Sources/Subs.php' (include_path='.:/usr/share/php:/usr/share/pear') in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php on line 58[/code]

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It happens in the middle of transferring a file to the server when I edit them, sorry about that.

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

just got this error while going to moparisthebest.com/smf

[code]Warning: require_once(/home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/Sources/Subs.php) [function.require-once]: failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php on line 58

Fatal error: require_once() [function.require]: Failed opening required ‘/home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/Sources/Subs.php’ (include_path=’.:/usr/share/php:/usr/share/pear’) in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php on line 58[/code]
Had to refresh a couple of times to get it away, did anyone else get this or was it just me?

EDIT: argh! again, this time while going into a topic

[code]Warning: require_once(/home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/Sources/Subs.php) [function.require-once]: failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php on line 58
